service.name: Lists all the unit names captured by catalog system
service.documentation: A useful method to retrieve the list of unit names used in catalogue system

service.name: Lists all the catalog names captured by catalog system with their ids
service.documentation: A useful method to retrieve the list of catalog names used in catalog system

service.name: Lists all the catalog names(Without default names)
service.documentation: A useful method to retrieve the list of catalog names used in catalog system without default values
